Is that so?\""},{"lineNumber":220054,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、深根ちゃんが使ってるのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, what Mikone-chan uses is"},{"lineNumber":220055,"originalJapaneseLine":"　神魔法じゃなくて、別系統の巫女術なの」","translatedEnglishLine":"not divine magic but a different type of priestess normally.\""},{"lineNumber":220058,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、今でも回復術、楽勝で使える」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, she can still easily use healing is"},{"lineNumber":220060,"originalJapaneseLine":"　百年に一人の逸材って言われてるのよ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"said to be a prodigy once in a hundred years.\""},{"lineNumber":220061,"originalJapaneseLine":"「言われても困る……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That only makes things harder for me...\""},{"lineNumber":220062,"originalJapaneseLine":"　才能ない方が楽そう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It’d probably be easier without talent...\""},{"lineNumber":220063,"originalJapaneseLine":"「と、深根ちゃん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A-Anyway, Mikone-chan...\""},{"lineNumber":220064,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん、そういえば丁度いい機会だね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, now that you mention it, this is a perfect opportunity.\""},{"lineNumber":220065,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今までこちらが独占していたから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Until now, we've been monopolizing things on our side,"},{"lineNumber":220066,"originalJapaneseLine":"　＜エール＞は話す機会は中々なかっただろう？","translatedEnglishLine":"so <Eiru> probably hasn't had many chances to talk, right?"},{"lineNumber":220067,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お互い質問とかあれば……」","translatedEnglishLine":"If either of you have questions for each other...\""},{"lineNumber":220068,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はむ、はぐっ……焼き芋、うまうま……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Munch, munch... roasted sweet potato, yum yum...\""},{"lineNumber":220069,"originalJapaneseLine":"「質問？　特にないよ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Questions? I don’t really have any.\""},{"lineNumber":220070,"originalJapaneseLine":"いつの間にか深根はリセットから受け取った","translatedEnglishLine":"Before you knew it, Mikone was shamelessly stuffing the roasted sweet potato she received from Reset into her mouth."},{"lineNumber":220071,"originalJapaneseLine":"焼き芋をはしたなく頬張っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地獄と繋がる国、死国です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It is the country connected to Hell, the Death Country."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 野営地の真ん中ではリセットが焼き芋を焼いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the middle of the camp, Reset was roasting sweet potatoes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はむはむ、んっぐ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Munch munch, nggh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: んーっ、焼き芋、うめー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mmm, roasted sweet potato, delicious!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは長田君と共に焼き芋にかぶりつく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You bite into a roasted sweet potato along with Nagata-kun.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホクホクとした食感と甘さを楽しんでいると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Enjoying the fluffy texture and sweetness,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセットがニコニコと話しかけてきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset smiled and spoke to you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、じゃんじゃん焼くからどんどん食べてね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, I'm roasting plenty, so keep eating as much as you want."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「焼き芋屋さんでもやるんすか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are you planning to become a sweet potato seller or something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やらないよー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, I'm not."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵士の皆さんの分も含めてだから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's because this includes portions for all the soldiers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大量になっちゃって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so it ended up being a huge amount..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いつも乱義ちゃんがお世話になってるから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Since you always take care of Rangi-chan,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちゃんとご挨拶をしないと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have to properly greet you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リセット、そういうことはしなくていいよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Reset, you don't have to do that kind of thing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わあっ、びっくり！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wow, you startled me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうしたの？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's wrong?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: テントから出てくるなんて珍しいね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's rare to see you come out of the tent."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、ただの休憩中だよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, I'm just on a break.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たまには外に出て部下達と顔を合わせないとね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sometimes I have to come outside and face my subordinates."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに、この子は定期的に外に出さないと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Besides, if I don't let this girl go outside regularly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずっと引きこもり続けるから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she'll just keep staying inside all the time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この子？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This girl?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「つ、つかれた……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "T-tired..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、巫女の深根ちゃんじゃーん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, it's Mikone-chan, the shrine maiden."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うひょー、相変わらずミステリアス美人ー♪」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whoa, still a mysterious beauty as always♪"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……って、めっちゃ疲れてね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...But you look really exhausted, don't you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん……疲れた……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah... I'm tired..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この野営地も魔物に襲われるからね、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This camp also gets attacked by monsters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 深根には負傷兵を治す回復役を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so Mikone is the healer who treats wounded soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: してもらっているんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've got her taking care of that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「深根は普段から何もしてなくて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mikone usually doesn't do much,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 穀潰しだと思われているんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and she's thought of as good-for-nothing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たまにはこれくらい、ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So I thought she deserves this much sometimes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「別に思われていいのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's fine if I'm thought that way..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「＜エール＞と大して年って変わらないっしょ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're about the same age as <Eiru>, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ってことはまさか、深根ちゃんも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Does that mean that Mikone-chan also

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新たに神魔法を覚えられるっつーこと？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: can learn new divine magic?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うはっ、それってすごくね！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa, isn't that amazing!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞にライバル出現！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A rival appears for <Eiru>!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、深根ちゃんはまた少し違うよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, Mikone-chan is a little different though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれ？　そーなんすか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh? Is that so?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、深根ちゃんが使ってるのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, what Mikone-chan uses is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 神魔法じゃなくて、別系統の巫女術なの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: not divine magic but a different type of priestess magic."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こっちは神様がいなくなっても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This one can still be used even if the gods are gone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普通に使えてるんだって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they say it works normally."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、今でも回復術、楽勝で使える」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, she can still easily use healing magic."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んふふ、これでも深根ちゃん、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, even so, Mikone-chan is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 百年に一人の逸材って言われてるのよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: said to be a prodigy once in a hundred years."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「言われても困る……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That only makes things harder for me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 才能ない方が楽そう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’d probably be easier without talent..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、深根ちゃん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A-Anyway, Mikone-chan..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん、そういえば丁度いい機会だね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, now that you mention it, this is a perfect opportunity."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今までこちらが独占していたから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Until now, we've been monopolizing things on our side,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞は話す機会は中々なかっただろう？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so <Eiru> probably hasn't had many chances to talk, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お互い質問とかあれば……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If either of you have questions for each other..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はむ、はぐっ……焼き芋、うまうま……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Munch, munch... roasted sweet potato, yum yum..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「質問？　特にないよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Questions? I don’t really have any."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつの間にか深根はリセットから受け取った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before you knew it, Mikone was shamelessly stuffing the roasted sweet potato she received from Reset into her mouth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 焼き芋をはしたなく頬張っていた。

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

side,"},{"lineNumber":220066,"originalJapaneseLine":"　＜エール＞は話す機会は中々なかっただろう？","translatedEnglishLine":"so <Eiru> probably hasn't had many chances to talk, right?"},{"lineNumber":220067,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お互い質問とかあれば……」","translatedEnglishLine":"If either of you have questions for each other...\""},{"lineNumber":220068,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はむ、はぐっ……焼き芋、うまうま……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Munch, munch... roasted sweet potato, yum yum...\""},{"lineNumber":220069,"originalJapaneseLine":"「質問？　特にないよ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Questions? I don’t really have any.\""},{"lineNumber":220070,"originalJapaneseLine":"いつの間にか深根はリセットから受け取った","translatedEnglishLine":"Before you knew it, Mikone was shamelessly stuffing the roasted sweet potato she received from Reset into her mouth."},{"lineNumber":220071,"originalJapaneseLine":"焼き芋をはしたなく頬張っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地獄と繋がる国、死国です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It is the country connected to Hell, the Death Country."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 野営地の真ん中ではリセットが焼き芋を焼いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the middle of the camp, Reset was roasting sweet potatoes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はむはむ、んっぐ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Munch munch, nggh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: んーっ、焼き芋、うめー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mmm, roasted sweet potato, delicious!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは長田君と共に焼き芋にかぶりつく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You bite into a roasted sweet potato along with Nagata-kun.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホクホクとした食感と甘さを楽しんでいると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Enjoying the fluffy texture and sweetness,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセットがニコニコと話しかけてきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset smiled and spoke to you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、じゃんじゃん焼くからどんどん食べてね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, I'm roasting plenty, so keep eating as much as you want."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「焼き芋屋さんでもやるんすか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are you planning to become a sweet potato seller or something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やらないよー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, I'm not."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵士の皆さんの分も含めてだから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's because this includes portions for all the soldiers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大量になっちゃって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so it ended up being a huge amount..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いつも乱義ちゃんがお世話になってるから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Since you always take care of Rangi-chan,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちゃんとご挨拶をしないと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have to properly greet you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リセット、そういうことはしなくていいよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Reset, you don't have to do that kind of thing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わあっ、びっくり！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wow, you startled me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうしたの？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's wrong?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: テントから出てくるなんて珍しいね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's rare to see you come out of the tent."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、ただの休憩中だよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, I'm just on a break.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たまには外に出て部下達と顔を合わせないとね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sometimes I have to come outside and face my subordinates."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに、この子は定期的に外に出さないと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Besides, if I don't let this girl go outside regularly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずっと引きこもり続けるから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she'll just keep staying inside all the time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この子？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This girl?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「つ、つかれた……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "T-tired..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、巫女の深根ちゃんじゃーん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, it's Mikone-chan, the shrine maiden."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うひょー、相変わらずミステリアス美人ー♪」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whoa, still a mysterious beauty as always♪"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……って、めっちゃ疲れてね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...But you look really exhausted, don't you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん……疲れた……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah... I'm tired..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この野営地も魔物に襲われるからね、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This camp also gets attacked by monsters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 深根には負傷兵を治す回復役を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so Mikone is the healer who treats wounded soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: してもらっているんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've got her taking care of that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「深根は普段から何もしてなくて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mikone usually doesn't do much,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 穀潰しだと思われているんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and she's thought of as good-for-nothing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たまにはこれくらい、ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So I thought she deserves this much sometimes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「別に思われていいのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's fine if I'm thought that way..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「＜エール＞と大して年って変わらないっしょ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're about the same age as <Eiru>, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ってことはまさか、深根ちゃんも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Does that mean that Mikone-chan also

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新たに神魔法を覚えられるっつーこと？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: can learn new divine magic?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うはっ、それってすごくね！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa, isn't that amazing!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞にライバル出現！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A rival appears for <Eiru>!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、深根ちゃんはまた少し違うよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, Mikone-chan is a little different though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれ？　そーなんすか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh? Is that so?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、深根ちゃんが使ってるのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, what Mikone-chan uses is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 神魔法じゃなくて、別系統の巫女術なの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: not divine magic but a different type of priestess magic."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こっちは神様がいなくなっても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This one can still be used even if the gods are gone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普通に使えてるんだって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they say it works normally."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、今でも回復術、楽勝で使える」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, she can still easily use healing magic."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んふふ、これでも深根ちゃん、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, even so, Mikone-chan is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 百年に一人の逸材って言われてるのよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: said to be a prodigy once in a hundred years."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「言われても困る……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That only makes things harder for me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 才能ない方が楽そう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’d probably be easier without talent..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、深根ちゃん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A-Anyway, Mikone-chan..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん、そういえば丁度いい機会だね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, now that you mention it, this is a perfect opportunity."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今までこちらが独占していたから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Until now, we've been monopolizing things on our side,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞は話す機会は中々なかっただろう？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so <Eiru> probably hasn't had many chances to talk, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お互い質問とかあれば……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If either of you have questions for each other..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はむ、はぐっ……焼き芋、うまうま……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Munch, munch... roasted sweet potato, yum yum..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「質問？　特にないよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Questions? I don’t really have any."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつの間にか深根はリセットから受け取った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before you knew it, Mikone was shamelessly stuffing the roasted sweet potato she received from Reset into her mouth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 焼き芋をはしたなく頬張っていた。
